--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Background
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

The goal of this script is to take PLINK formatted data and split into training
and testing data to pass to "DIMdetect2.py".

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
PreReqs
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

>> module load gcc bioinfo plink texlive

The PLINK format files for the particular dataset that you are using are needed.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Command Line
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Running the file**
>> bash bose_splitdata.sh --cases NUM_CASES --controls NUM_CONTROLS PLINK_FILE_PREFIX

**e.g.**
>> bash bose_splitdata.sh --cases 1500 --controls 1500 Parkinsons

**Arguments**

"--cases" flag is for the number of cases to randomly take out of the dataset to train with.

"--controls" flag is for the number of controls to randomly take out of the dataset to train with.

The last argument is the PLINK file prefix that you are extracting from. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Design Decisions and Issues
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4/11/2019:
Currently, no flexibility to change number of cases and controls for testing (fixed at 20/20) but can be
edited at a later date.
